name: Lavender Fields Forever
description:
Lavender Fields Forever is an action-packed game about farming lavender. Experience:

  • Gratuitous gun violence against gnomes!
  • Cute animals!
  • Base building including walls, mole turrets, and roads!

You're on a mission out into the steppe, a mission to transform those barren lands into a blooming oasis. Invite more and more animal companions to your camp, fortify your defenses against thieving gnomes, and let the Lavender bloom as far as you can see from atop your spire once more!

-------------

Controls:

  • 1-4 - Select farming tool (press again to deselect)
  • R - Select pistol
  • Space/Click - Use tool/fire pistol
  • Esc - Pause/exit build menu

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/lavender-showdown
